alert.note: Alert for Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 10 at 11:33PM CDT until April 11 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN OSAGE AND NORTHWESTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1133 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Osage Hills State Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Pawhuska... Barnsdall... Wynona... Ochelata... Bigheart... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Okesa... Wah Sha She State Park... Tallant... Pershing... Nelagoney... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
